page.title: 07 Gosforth Park Hotel contd.
page.content: blue and white uniforms.The staff work from 6:45 to 10:30,then 18:30 to 22:30. When the maids are cleaning the rooms out they have to vacuum the floor,make the beds and get new bed clothes every morning.There are 2 dining rooms.The Food and Beverage manager,Chef and the manager set out the menu's.The waiters have 8 tables each.The no. of waiters on each shift depends on the forecasted level of business.The hotel has a conference hall that can hold 500 people for dinner dances,etc.At the hotel the food is imported from different countries.Tropical fruits come from Morocco with other food coming from America,France,N.Zealand. The meat and fish are all British with vegetables coming from the local market in Newcastle.Other local suppliers are in Jesmond and Sunderland.Of the food 99% is fresh and 1% is frozen .The chef
